title: Rek'sai back animation bug on eternum and pool party skins
body: After a certain point in the game, (not exactly sure when, but i noticed by at least 3 minutes in the game), the rek'sai back animation does not go through completely, it'll do the like first 3/4ths of the recall, then it will go into idle position for the last 1/4th of the recall, so the eternum does not teleport, and pool party does not eat the frog, can we fix this please? :(

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This is a known issue that should be fixed soon. Thanks for the report!
Thanks for the response, and i'll be looking forward to that! :D
